name: Satori Color Scheme
summary: Satori is an elegant and clean color scheme for Vim
description:
Satori is a very elegant and clean color scheme for both white or black background terminals. This color scheme has been developed under  Mac OS X terminal in mind but it also looks great in another Unix variants.

Development version in http://code.google.com/p/ruda/source/browse/trunk/satori.vim
install_details:
Download the script and...

home$ mkdir -p .vim/colors/
home$ mv satori.vim .vim/colors/

Edit your .vimrc and insert "colorscheme satori".

versions.release_notes:
- No longer coloring Functions group.
- Updated author's email.
- Other Cosmetics.

- Numbers are now colored like strings (red)
- Special symbols like \n is now colored magenta for a better contrast to strings
- Preprocessor macros is now colored  blue
